mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userName, phone1, phone2, phone3, gender, age, regDate) VALUES(#{userName}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{gender}, #{age}, SYSDATE())
INSERT INTO id (id, pw, authority) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{authority} )
